com.guardtime.envelope.verification.result

Class ResultHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.envelope.verification.result.ResultHolder

  • public class ResultHolder
extends Object
    Helper class for gathering and accessing RuleVerificationResults.

    • Method Detail

      • getResults

        public List<RuleVerificationResult> getResults()
        Returns:
        All verification results gathered.

      • getResults

        public List<RuleVerificationResult> getResults(SignatureContent content)
        Parameters:
        content - for which verification results must apply.
        Returns:
        The verification results specific to provided SignatureContent as well as generic results not specific to any SignatureContent.

      • getSignatureResults

        public List<SignatureResult> getSignatureResults(SignatureContent content)
        Parameters:
        content - for which root signature verification results must apply.
        Returns:
        Root signature verification results specific to provided SignatureContent.

      • getGeneralResults

        public List<RuleVerificationResult> getGeneralResults()
        Returns:
        Verification results that apply to an Envelope and not to any one specific SignatureContent.

      • addSignatureResult

        public void addSignatureResult(SignatureContent content,
                               SignatureResult result)
        Adds a SignatureResult to the result set for the provided SignatureContent.
        Parameters:
        content - to which the result is added.
        result - to be added.

      • addResult

        public void addResult(RuleVerificationResult ruleVerificationResult)
        Adds the provided RuleVerificationResult to the general result set.
        Parameters:
        ruleVerificationResult - to be added to the result set.

      • addResults

        public void addResults(List<RuleVerificationResult> ruleVerificationResults)
        Adds the provided list of RuleVerificationResults to the general result set.
        Parameters:
        ruleVerificationResults - list to be added to the result set.

      • addResult

                      RuleVerificationResult ruleVerificationResult)
        Adds the provided RuleVerificationResult to the result set of the specified SignatureContent.
        Parameters:

        ruleVerificationResult - to be added.
